means: 不加掩饰的，坦率的，公开的

sentence.Network_en: By mid-season the hostility between the two was undisguised.
sentence.Network_cn: 赛季过半时，双方之间的敌意已经公开化了。

sentence.Network_en: Hean looked down at Bauer in undisguised disgust.
sentence.Network_cn: 希恩低头看了看鲍尔，毫不掩饰自己的厌恶。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(U1)|无忧教育 ... undiscovered 未被发觉的 undisguised 公然的 undisguisedly 公然地.
赤的意思 - 解释 - 网络字典 ... 赤露〖 bare〗 赤裸裸〖 naked;undisguised〗 赤贫〖 inabjectpoverty;utterlydestitute〗.
自定义... ... 兵来将挡,水来土掩 to adopt measures appropriate to the actual situation 不加掩饰 undisguised 刺网 gillnets.
Our spy photographers caught it running undisguised in public during final testing ., 我们的间谍摄影师被它毫不掩饰地在公共运行期间最后的测试.

list.abs: From the start of that campaign , I faced undisguised hostility because of my sex ., 从竞选一开始 , 我就要面对他们毫不掩饰的对女性的敌意.
From the start to that campaign , I faced undisguised hostility because of my sex ., 从竞选运动一开始我便因是女性而面对毫不掩饰的敌意.
Our previous spy shots have revealed a nearly undisguised version of the 2010 GL ., 我们过去的间谍杆揭示了几乎毫不掩饰的 2010年版本的冰川.
Hitler ' s undisguised effort to persecute the Jews met with worldwide condemnation ., 希特勒对犹太人的露骨迫害行为遭到世界人民的谴责.
Most notable is the completely undisguised grille , and the sporty new front and rear bumpers ., 最值得注意的是完全不加掩饰的格栅 , 以及运动新的前部和后部保险杠.

entry.tran: 不加掩饰的；公开的；坦率的
entry.def: If you describe someone's feelings as undisguised, you mean that they show them openly and do not make any attempt to hide them.

example.ex: Hean looked down at Bauer in undisguised disgust...
example.tran: 希恩低头看了看鲍尔，毫不掩饰自己的厌恶。

auth_sentence.content: She forced her body into the spotlight, its profound damage undisguised.
auth_sentence.res_content: She forced her body into the spotlight, its profound damage undisguised.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: She forced her body into the spotlight, its profound damage undisguised.

auth_sentence.content: The drinkers...watched him with undisguised curiosity.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The drinkers...watched him with undisguised curiosity.

auth_sentence.content: I think you do see it, and revel in it as a chance to unleash your own undisguised attacks.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: I think you do see it, and revel in it as a chance to unleash your own undisguised attacks.

means.word_mean: 不加掩饰的;坦率的;公开的

sentences.en: She looked at him with immediate and undisguised contempt.
sentences.cn: 她用毫不掩饰的轻蔑眼光看着他。
